segments.text: How may I help you . sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm wondering if anyone has turned in a train ticket . I just lost my ticket for Beijing tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . I'm sorry . Nothing's been turned in . Do you want to buy another one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . If I don ' t make it to Beijing tomorrow morning . my wife would kill me . How much does it cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where is my wallet ? Someone has stolen my wallet !
segments.speaker: S2
